sentences.en: And this ten-thousand fold cosmos shivered & quivered & quaked, while a great, measureless radiance appeared in the cosmos, surpassing the effulgence of the devas.
sentences.cn: 此十千宇宙在抖动、颤动、震动，一道大无量光出现在宇宙间，胜于天神的灿烂。

sentences.en: Fuelled by morbid energy, a Great Unclean One pays careful attention to all of his followers, delighting in the smallest boil, reveling in the variety and effulgence of their poxes .
sentences.cn: 充斥于病疫的活力之中，大不净者关注着所有他手下的方方面面，从最小的疮疖中获得了欣喜，又陶醉于他们多种多样闪着光辉的脓包之中。

sentences.en: If the effulgence of a thousand suns simultaneously were to blaze forth in the firmament ;
sentences.cn: 假如天空中有一千个太阳同时放射光芒，或许才可以和至尊人格神宇宙形象的辉煌灿烂相媲美。

sentences.en: The effulgence of algorithm will shine the dark future brightly!
sentences.cn: 这句不知道翻译的好不好,我的原意是:算法之光辉将照亮黑暗前路!

sentences.en: They began to loose the spiritual effulgence and grace that was bestowed on them.
sentences.cn: 他们开始松散的精神光辉和优雅这是赋予他们。

sentences.en: Trust us! Work together, We'll be effulgence in the future path of cooperation.
sentences.cn: 相信我们！在未来携手合作的事业道路上，我们一定风光无限、灿烂辉煌！

sentences.en: With that word "death" the heat seemed to increase till it became a threatening weight and the lagoon attacked them with a blinding effulgence.
sentences.cn: 随着这个“死”字， 暑热仿佛越来越厉害，热得逼人。环礁湖也以令人目眩的灿烂袭击着他们。
